activities: Godfrey collects personal information from our website’s visitors in order to establish a business relationship and market to those individuals. This is done by collecting email addresses and applicable personally identifiable information through web forms. Users are given the option to opt-out of communications from Godfrey via a standard unsubscribe link included in any marketing communications. Any information collected is stored behind a password and SSL secured interface (Ingage) intended to manage marketing communications and automatically remove unsubscribed users. The ability also exists to manually remove personally identifiable information via this system at a user’s request
contactoff1: Godfrey, 40 North Christian Street, Lancaster, PA 17602
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Data collected on-line and manually apply to Godfrey’s application to Safe Harbor. This data is limited to personally identifiable information such as name and email
